entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 6 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
